document_data.mainbody:
Hargun Tamaraith was the father of Narm Tamaraith.
His son, Narm Tamaraith, believed he was a ranger until he came down with the shaking fever.
Hargun dealt in smithwork and weaponsmithing.
Hargun married Fythuera, who traded as his equal. They had one child, Narm.
As of , 22 years prior to , Hargun and Fythueras child, Narm, was born. They had been married for some time prior. While Narm was still a baby, they traveled to Triboar and then to Waterdeep, up and down the Sword Coast in search of commerce opportunities. In , 11 years prior to 1357 DR, they were slain in Baldurs Gate while in the crossfire of a duel between Kluennh Tzarr and Algarzel Halfcloak. Harguns last act was to hurl Narm into the river, so that he would survive the fireball.
His son Narm sought to become a master of the Art in order to avenge his parents.
Per Elminster, Hargun and his wife may have been Harpers.
